variations.template: You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.

variations.template: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.

variations.template: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost, then exile it. You can't exile Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.
rts: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost, then exile it. You can't exile Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.
